rules_text:
Target opponent chooses a creature they control. Other creatures they control can’t block this turn.
Memento {3}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {3}{R}{R}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield transformed after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
First strike, haste
Battle cry [i](Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]
